get.summary: Retrieves the camera by its Id.

404.description: The camera with given Id was not found.

delete.summary: Deletes a camera by its id.

204.description: The camera with given id was deleted successfully.

404.description: The camera with given id was not found.

get.summary: Retrieves all cameras.

put.description:
Supported values for ```FaceDetectorResourceId``` are:


    none, cpu, gpu, accurate_cpu, accurate_gpu, cpu_remote, gpu_remote, any_remote, accurate_cpu_remote, accurate_gpu_remote, accurate_any_remote

Supported values for ```TemplateGeneratorResourceId``` are:


    cpu, gpu, any

Supported values for ```PedestrianDetectorResourceId``` are:

    none, cpu_remote, gpu_remote, any_remote, sfe_object_cpu_remote, sfe_object_gpu_remote, sfe_object_any_remote
 
Supported values for ```SpoofDetectorResourceIds``` are:
            
    none, liveness_distant_cpu_remote, liveness_distant_gpu_remote, liveness_distant_any_remote, liveness_nearby_cpu_remote, liveness_nearby_gpu_remote, liveness_nearby_any_remote
            
Supported values for ```PedestrianExtractorResourceId``` are:

    cpu, gpu, any, none
            
Supported values for ```PalmDetectorResourceId``` are:

    none, cpu

Supported values for ```PalmTemplateGeneratorResourceId``` are:

    cpu

            
Supported values for ```PalmSpoofDetectorResourceId``` are:
            
    none, liveness_any_remote
            
Supported values for ```ObjectDetectorResourceId``` are:

    none, sfe_object_cpu_remote, sfe_object_gpu_remote, sfe_object_any_remote
            
Supported values for ```FaceSaveStrategy``` are:
            
    Balanced, None, All, MatchedOnly
            
Supported values for ```PedestrianSaveStrategy``` are:
            
    Balanced, None, All
            
Supported values for ```ObjectSaveStrategy``` are:
            
    Balanced, None, All, MatchedOnly

requestBody.description: New camera configuration.

404.description: The camera was not found.

400.description: The sent request was not valid.

post.summary: Checks liveness of one face on the given image.
post.description:
Supported values for ```FaceDetectorResourceId``` are:


    cpu, gpu, any, accurate_cpu, accurate_gpu, accurate_any
            
Supported values for ```SpoofDetectorResourceId``` are:

            
    liveness_distant_any_remote, liveness_distant_cpu_remote, liveness_distant_gpu_remote
    liveness_nearby_any_remote, liveness_nearby_cpu_remote, liveness_nearby_gpu_remote
 
```SpoofCheckConfig.KeepEvaluatingConditionsAfterFirstFail``` is used

 to evaluate all conditions supplied with ``` Nearby/Distant LivenessConditions ```.

 When ```true``` it can have slight performance impact, because all conditions are evaluated

get.summary: Retrieves the image by its Id.
get.description:
Two optional parameters can be specified that allow the image to be resize to given values.
More specifically, minSize will resize the smaller edge to minSize, maxSize will resize the larger edge to maxSize.

parameters.name: minSize
parameters.description: Minimum size of the smaller edge.

parameters.name: maxSize
parameters.description: Maximum size of the larger edge.

put.description:
If the watchlist with specified Id does not exist, it creates it with the requested Id.
If the watchlist with specified Id exists, it updates it.

When setting ```PreviewColor```, hexadecimal format is necessary to use, e.g. ```#012abc``` or ```#01a```.

post.description:
Supported values for ```FaceDetectorResourceId``` are:

            
    cpu, gpu, any, accurate_cpu, accurate_gpu, accurate_any
            
Supported values for ```TemplateGeneratorResourceId``` are:


    cpu, gpu, any
            
Supported values for ```SpoofDetectorResourceId``` are:

            
    none,
    liveness_distant_any_remote, liveness_distant_cpu_remote, liveness_distant_gpu_remote
    liveness_nearby_any_remote, liveness_nearby_cpu_remote, liveness_nearby_gpu_remote
Supported values for ```FaceValidationMode``` are:

            
    none, predefined

post.summary: Searches for matching watchlist members by provided palm template/s.

parameters.name: X-Session-Id
parameters.description: All TCS Transaction(s) that this action creates will have their SessionId set to the value from this header. If no value is provided, the SessionId will be set to the TransactionId.

requestBody.description: Request containing palm template and ids of watchlists to be searched.

400.description: The sent request was not valid.

404.description: Watchlists with specified ids were not found.

409.description: Palm modality is not enabled in license.

get.summary: Retrieves the watchlist members as a paged collection.
get.description: Page number, page size and sorting order can be specified. You can also show total items count.

400.description: The sent request was not valid.

post.summary: Creates a new watchlist member.

requestBody.description: Request specifying watchlist member properties.

400.description: The sent request was not valid.

409.description: There was a conflict while creating the new watchlist member.

put.description:
If the watchlist member with specified Id does not exist, it creates it with the requested Id.
If the watchlist member with specified Id exists, it updates it.

requestBody.description: Request specifying which watchlist member should be updated and how to update it.

400.description: The sent request was not valid.

get.summary: Retrieves the watchlist member by its id.

404.description: The watchlist member with given id was not found.

delete.summary: Deletes a watchlist member by its id.

204.description: The watchlist member with given id was deleted successfully.

404.description: The watchlist member with given id was not found.

get.summary: Retrieves faces for given watchlist member id as a paged collection.
get.description: Page number, page size and sorting order can be specified. You can also show total items count.

400.description: The sent request was not valid.

get.summary: Retrieves palms for given watchlist member id as a paged collection.
get.description: Page number, page size and sorting order can be specified. You can also show total items count.

400.description: The sent request was not valid.

post.summary: Links specified watchlist members to a given watchlist.

requestBody.description: Request specifying watchlist member ids and watchlist id

204.description: Watchlist members were successfully linked to the watchlist.

400.description: The sent request was not valid.

404.description: The watchlist or watchlist members were not found.

post.summary: Unlinks specified watchlist members for a given watchlist.

requestBody.description: Request specifying watchlist member ids and watchlist id

204.description: Watchlist members were successfully unlinked from the watchlist.

400.description: The sent request was not valid.

404.description: The watchlist or watchlist members were not found.

post.summary: Registers a watchlist member.
post.description:
Supported values for ```FaceDetectorResourceId``` are:


    cpu, gpu, any, accurate_cpu, accurate_gpu, accurate_any

Supported values for ```TemplateGeneratorResourceId``` are:


    cpu, gpu, any
            
Supported values for ```PalmDetectorResourceId``` are:


    cpu
Supported values for ```FaceValidationMode``` are:

            
    none, predefined

Supported values for ```PalmSide``` are:


    Left, Right, Unspecified

Supported values for ```Modality``` are:


    Face, Palm

requestBody.description: Request specifying watchlist member register details.

400.description: The sent request was not valid.

409.description: A concurrent transient error occurred, or the license conditions were not met.

422.description: Detected face or palm did not pass validation and is not suitable for use.

post.summary: Adds a specified face to a given watchlist member.
post.description:
Supported values for ```FaceValidationMode``` are:

            
    none, predefined

requestBody.description: Request specifying face id to add.

204.description: The face was successfully added to the watchlist member.

404.description: The face or watchlist member were not found.

400.description: The sent request was not valid.

409.description: There was a conflict adding the specified face to the watchlist member.

422.description: Face did not pass validation and is not suitable for use.

    cpu, gpu, any
Supported values for ```FaceValidationMode``` are:

requestBody.description: The image with face to add with configuration.
